Package com.bws.jdistil.core.validation.rules

Interface Summary
IActionRule Interface specifying methods to implement when defining classes capable of performing action data validation.
IFieldRule Interface specifying methods to implement when defining classes capable of performing validation on a given field value.
 

Class Summary
AtLeastOneFieldRule Action rule requiring data for at least one of a specified set of fields.
BaseFieldRule Abstract base class implementing the IFieldRule interface.  Provides default validation checking, support for storing and retrieving the error text and support for retrieving field descriptions based on a field ID.
ConverterRule Class used to validate field values based on a field's associated field converter.
EmailRule Class used to validate email fields.
MaxLengthRule Class used to validate the maximum length of a field value.
NumberRule Class used to validate numeric fields associated with one of the numeric field converters.
PhoneNumberRule Class used to validate phone number fields.
PostalCodeRule Class used to validate postal code fields.
RegularExpressionRule Base class used to validate fields using a regular expression.
